{"id":1311828819,"question_id":3264,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1720281536,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"123 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1311828819/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Points After Enemy Battles","memory":"76 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long maximumPoints(vector<int>& enemyPowers, int currentEnergy) {\n        \n        int n = enemyPowers.size();\n        long long score = 0;\n        \n        sort(enemyPowers.begin(), enemyPowers.end());\n        \n        int left = 0;\n        int right = n-1;\n        \n        while(left <= right){\n            \n            if(enemyPowers[left] > currentEnergy){\n                if(score == 0){\n                    return 0;\n                }\n                while (currentEnergy < enemyPowers[left]) {\n                    currentEnergy += enemyPowers[right];\n                    right--;\n                }\n            } \n            else {\n                int points = currentEnergy / enemyPowers[left];\n                currentEnergy %= enemyPowers[left];\n                score += points;\n            }\n           \n        }\n        return score;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-points-after-enemy-battles","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
